q: . Ken Auletta , author of "Googled: The End of the World as We Know It," told Bloomberg TV last week that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the administration of U.S. Barack Obama . Maybe he'll find some kind of astonishing offer, either at a startup or at a foundation or from a political unit, but today, he's hanging on to the right to define his job as he sees fit while continuing to make a pile of money, said Whit Andrews, a Shrewsbury, Massachusetts-based analyst at Gartner Google Inc. insisted that the referendum "shows that there is no possibility of ruling a factory without the consensus of the workers." Industry Minister Maurizio Sacconi predicted the decision would encourage investment in Italian industry. The outcome of the referendum opens an evolution in industrial relations, especially in large factories that should allow a better use of the plants and a real increase in salaries, Maurizio Sacconi told Italian state radio. Sergio Marchionne had pledged to link pay increases to productivity. But the flexible work rules also limit the right to strike during full production, and reduce break times and sick pay

that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" "We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together," Anthony Morrow said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Anthony Morrow scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.

A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now. "The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued, "because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere." Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.

But David Letterman 's researchers seriously low-balled Bruce Willis 's impact.
